Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 17th overall pick, by Boston (UBA) in 1981...
Had first career hit on 6/8/1985, off Chad Romig (GHG)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/9/1985, off Perry Drennon (GHG)...
Hit for the cycle against West Texas on 8/14/1985...
Had 6 hits with 1 RBI against West Texas on 8/14/1985...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against Diablo on 9/24/1987...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
Won World Championship with Boston (UBA) in 1988...
Drove in 6 runs against Manchester on 4/9/1989...
Was selected to the 1990 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/7/1990, hitting .556 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Northeastern on 5/10/1991...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/12/1991, hitting .522 with 1 HR, 4 RBI...
Was selected to the 1991 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Diablo on 6/21/1992...
Was selected to the 1992 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/22/1992, hitting .529 with 2 HR, 5 RBI...
